name: Make or Break (Cammymoop)
description:
You can make, or you can break, but not both.
Play through several platforming challenges as either a maker or a breaker.

Controls:

Left/Right/A/D: move/choose level/choose power

Z/Space: Jump/select level/select power

X/Mouse Left: GAZE

Esc: back out to previous menu

Source here: https://github.com/FelixNemis/ICTJam13

Made for ICT Game Jam Winter 2022/Global Game Jam
